# Templates

This directory contains templates for various testing artifacts that can be customized for your projects.

## Available Templates

### Planning Phase
- [Test Plan Template](test-plan-template.md) - Comprehensive test planning document
- [Risk Assessment Template](risk-assessment-template.md) - Risk identification and mitigation

### Test Case Development
- [Test Case Template](test-case-template.md) - Detailed test case specification
- [Traceability Matrix Template](traceability-matrix-template.md) - Requirements to test case mapping

### Environment Setup
- [Environment Setup Checklist](environment-setup-checklist.md) - Environment readiness validation
- [Environment Configuration Document](environment-config-template.md) - Environment specifications

### Test Execution
- [Test Execution Report Template](test-execution-report-template.md) - Test execution summary
- [Defect Report Template](defect-report-template.md) - Defect documentation

### Analysis and Reporting
- [Test Analysis Report Template](test-analysis-report-template.md) - Analysis findings
- [Test Summary Report Template](test-summary-report-template.md) - Executive summary
- [Test Completion Report Template](test-completion-report-template.md) - Final test report
- [Metrics Dashboard Template](metrics-dashboard-template.md) - Metrics tracking
- [Executive Summary Template](executive-summary-template.md) - High-level overview
- [Presentation Template](presentation-template.md) - Stakeholder presentations

## Usage Guidelines

1. **Select the appropriate template** for your testing artifact
2. **Customize** the template to match your project needs
3. **Fill in** all required sections
4. **Review** with stakeholders before finalizing
5. **Update** regularly as the project progresses

## Template Customization

### For Agile/Scrum Projects
- Focus on lightweight, essential information
- Minimize documentation overhead
- Emphasize collaboration over documentation
- Use templates as starting points, not rigid structures

### For Waterfall Projects
- Use complete templates with all sections
- Maintain comprehensive documentation
- Follow formal review and approval processes
- Ensure traceability across all artifacts

## Contributing

If you develop new templates or improve existing ones, please document:
- Purpose of the template
- When to use it
- How to customize it
- Examples of filled templates
